Synapse DX Flight Computer
kDesc
A minor stability increase is offset by a longer transonic period as you push through the speed of sound. [#Legal]
Une petite augmentation de stabilité vient compenser un temps de pilotage transsonique accru. [#Legal]
Die leicht verbesserte Stabilität bringt eine längere transsonische Phase beim durchbrechen der Schallmauer mit sich. [#Legal]
Una minore stabilità è bilanciata da un periodo transonico maggiore per abbattere la velocità del suono. [#Legal]
Un periodo transónico mayor activa un pequeño aumento de la estabilidad en tu intento por llegar a la velocidad del sonido. [#Legal]
僅かながらも安定性を向上し、遷音速域での走行を従来よりも持続させ、超音速域への移行を遅延します。 [#Legal]
안정성이 조금 향상되지만, 음속을 주파할 때 걸리는 시간이 조금 더 늘어납니다. [#Legal]
A minor stability increase is offset by a longer transonic period as you push through the speed of sound. [#Legal]
以音速行駛時間越久，稍微提升的穩定性會被抵銷。 [#Legal]
以音速行駛時間越久，稍微提升的穩定性會被抵銷。 [#Legal]
A minor stability increase is offset by a longer transonic period as you push through the speed of sound. [#Legal]
